title: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI option is chosen
description: When I select the SWT.MULTI option in the ControlExampleText, it causes a beeping sound. This doesn't seem to be the expected behavior.
OB: After choosing the SWT.MULTI option, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: Instead of the beeping sound, I expect the ControlExampleText to function normally without any sound.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option from the available options.
3. Click on other buttons within the application.
